TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAssemblyPostProcessor implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 定义方法，类可实现这些方法在生成程序集之后对程序集进行处理。

span.span: Defines the method a class implements to process an assembly after the assembly has been built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在已编译之后，实现此接口的类可以访问程序集。A class implementing this interface can access an assembly after it has been compiled. 类编译的程序集，然后检查以查看是否接口已注册的 Web 配置文件中。The class compiles assemblies and then checks to see whether an interface has been registered in the Web configuration file. 如果是这样，实例调用方法接口来执行任何操作之后编译和之前加载程序集。If so, the instance calls the method for the interface to perform any action after the compilation and before loading the assembly. 例如，探查器工具可以实现此接口可建立在程序集中的探测。For example, a profiler tool could implement this interface to establish probes in the assembly. 当注册接口，ASP.NET 应用程序和其程序集将始终为以调试模式编译。When an interface is registered, the ASP.NET application and its assemblies will always be compiled in debug mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实现接口，并将其注册 Web 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example demonstrates how to create an implementation of the interface, and register it in the Web.config file of a Web application. 下面的代码示例的第一部分创建一个名为类`Samples.Process.postProcessTest`实现接口。The first part of the code example creates a class named `Samples.Process.postProcessTest` that implements the interface. 此类执行的写入文件的简单操作时调用方法。This class performs the simple action of writing a file when the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/CS/postProcessTest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/VB/postProcessTest.vb#1)] 将该类编译为.dll 文件使用命令`csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`。Compile the class into a .dll file with the command `csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`. 将产生的.dll 文件添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Bin 文件夹，并在 Web.config 文件中，注册.dll，如下面的代码中所示。Add the resulting .dll file to the Bin folder of an ASP.NET application and register the .dll in the Web.config file, as shown in the following code. ``` ``` 当用户访问网站时，Web 应用程序时动态编译和 MyTest.txt 将写入到 C:\compile 文件。When a user visits the Web site, the Web application is dynamically compiled and the file MyTest.txt will be written to C:\compile.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostProcessAssembly(string path) cil managed

summary.span: 在加载程序集之前调用，可允许实现类对程序集进行修改。

span.span: Called before the assembly is loaded to allow the implementing class to modify the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在已编译的程序集之后调用此方法。The class calls this method after the assembly has been compiled. 加载程序集应包括在此方法之前，先要执行任何操作。Any actions to be taken before loading the assembly should be included in this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实现接口，并将其注册 Web 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example demonstrates how to create an implementation of the interface, and register it in the Web.config file of a Web application. 下面的代码示例的第一部分创建一个名为类`Samples.Process.postProcessTest`实现接口。The first part of the code example creates a class named `Samples.Process.postProcessTest` that implements the interface. 此类执行的写入文件的简单操作时调用方法。This class performs the simple action of writing a file when the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/CS/postProcessTest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/VB/postProcessTest.vb#1)] 将该类编译为.dll 文件使用命令`csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`。Compile the class into a .dll file with the command `csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`. 将产生的.dll 文件添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Bin 文件夹，并在 Web.config 文件中，注册.dll，如下面的代码中所示。Add the resulting .dll file to the Bin folder of an ASP.NET application and register the .dll in the Web.config file, as shown in the following code. ``` ``` 当用户访问网站时，Web 应用程序时动态编译和 MyTest.txt 将写入到 C:\compile 文件。When a user visits the Web site, the Web application is dynamically compiled and the file MyTest.txt will be written to C:\compile.
